# Envy (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Add [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] to your list of cleric class skills. In addition, you cast spells that damage or drain ability scores or bestow negative levels at +1 caster level.

**Envy Domain Spells**

**1 [[Disguise Self (Spell)|Disguise Self]]:** Changes your appearance.

**2 [[Ray of Enfeeblement (Spell)|Ray of Enfeeblement]]:** Ray deals 1d6+1/2 levels Str penalty.

**3 [[Touch of Idiocy (Spell)|Touch of Idiocy]]:** Subject takes 1d6-point penalty to Int, Wis, and Cha.

**4 [[Vampiric Touch (Spell)|Vampiric Touch]]:** Touch deals 1d6/2 levels damage; caster gains damage as hp.

**5 [[Crushing Despair (Spell)|Crushing Despair]]:** Subjects take –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

**6 [[Magic Jar (Spell)|Magic Jar]] <sup>F</sup>:** Enables possession of another creature.

**7 [[Limited Wish (Spell)|Limited Wish]] <sup>X</sup>:** Alters reality—within spell limits.

**8 [[Simulacrum (Spell)|Simulacrum]] <sup>MX</sup>:** Creates partially real double of a creature.

**9 [[Wish (Spell)|Wish]] <sup>X</sup>:** As *[[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]],* but with fewer limits.
